body_html: I based my suggestion on the one flat_map code example on the github page you linked. There, single string tensors come in (file names) and whole Datasets are emitted in the map function, so that seems pretty clear. I guess the parallel processing from map() is a TODO, I'm sure they'd love a PR :)

body: I based my suggestion on the one flat_map code example on the github page you linked. There, single string tensors come in (file names) and whole Datasets are emitted in the map function, so that seems pretty clear. I guess the parallel processing from `map()` is a TODO, I'm sure they'd love a PR :)
